section.title: Conversion from String to Number
section.para: The conversion from string to number is independent from the locale settings, e.g., it is always using the English notification for number. In this notification a correct number format is "8.20". Thed German number "8,20" would result in an error.

To convert from a German number, you have to use the NumberFormat class. The challenge is that when the value is, for example, 98.00 then the NumberFormat class would create a Long which cannot be casted to Double. Hence the following complex conversion class.
